svg.text: McCzarny recently pushed multiple updates to
his flexible-log-analyzer and upload-image
repositories. In flexible-log-analyzer, he
removed unused color properties and simplified
configuration. He introduced Prettier for code
formatting, integrated with ESLint, to maintain
code style. Key improvements include detailed
performance logging with a new
enablePerformanceLogging setting and optimized
cache invalidation. He also enhanced file link
handling, allowing specific search paths, and
introduced an "enabled" field for matchers to
selectively disable them. Several development
dependencies were updated, such as @types/node
and @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin, along
with the VS Code engine requirement. He
streamlined test scripts, performed general
code cleanup, and added an issue counter. The
package version for flexible-log-analyzer was
updated multiple times, including bumps to
0.3.5 and 0.3.1. In the upload-image
repository, McCzarny updated the axios package
to version 1.12.0. These activities indicate a
focus on code quality, performance, and feature
refinement across his projects.
Generated on: Sun Oct 5 01:53:32 2025
